 say_hello (to)

Say hello to some body

say_hello("nbdev")

'Hello nbdev'



assert say_hello("nbdev") == "Hello nbdev"


from fastcore.test import *


test_eq(say_hello('nbdev'), "Hello nbdev")


from IPython.display import display,SVG


display(SVG('<svg height="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40"/></svg>'))

nbdev_install_quarto # 安装Quarto

title: nbdev-demo
text:
How to use

初始化Repo
使用如下命令初始化
nbdev_new


启用GitHub Pages
在Settings Tabl找到 Pages, 在Branch中设置 gh-pages


安装 git-friendly notebooks
nbdev_install_hooks


导出与安装
使用如下命令导出包
nbdev_export
安装包
pip install -e '.[dev]'


预览
输入如下命令, 打开URL
nbdev_preview


提交
提交前先执行nbdev_prepare命令，这个命令会执行如下几个命令

nbdev_export: Builds the .py modules from Jupyter notebooks
nbdev_test: Tests your notebooks
nbdev_clean: Cleans your notebooks to get rid of extreanous output for git
nbdev_readme: Updates your repo’s README.md file from your index notebook.
